title: 启动器忘却的旋律有问题
author: 隔壁老怕
txt_content:
我用忘却的旋律启动器改了游戏名字就进不去了到加载雕像95%时闪退[img]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/QQ/Temp/[8%25F2]@BDL$%25NNT@_O82NN8.png[/img][img]file:///C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/Administrator/Application%20Data/Tencent/QQ/Temp/[8%25F2]@BDL$%25NNT@_O82NN8.png[/img]
（弱弱的问一下图上了没？）

replies.author: 隔壁老怕
replies.txt_content: 玩的是冒险者传说的客户端

replies.author: 筒子
replies.txt_content: 首先就不能使用中文名字好嘛！！

replies.author: 隔壁老怕
replies.txt_content:
qzz740827 发表于 2015-3-18 19:49
minecraft不支持中文游戏名
支持啊，现在在好了，我的名字是隔壁老怕。能进去了，谢谢还是。
